section.title: /etc/dnsmasq.conf
section.para: 一般配置下面三处即可

section.title: dnsmasq.resolv.conf
section.screen:
sudo cp /etc/resolv.conf /etc/dnsmasq.resolv.conf
cat > /etc/dnsmasq.resolv.conf <<EOF nameserver 208.67.222.222 nameserver 208.67.220.220 EOF
/etc/init.d/dnsmasq reload or sudo killall -s SIGHUP dnsmasq

section.title: dnsmasq.hosts
section.para: dnsmasq 默认会读取 /etc/hosts 如果你不想让它解析/etc/hosts文件，可以自己定义一个文件。
section.screen:
cat /var/log/message
Sep 15 18:17:24 J10-51-MemCache dnsmasq[13799]: read /etc/hosts - 2 addresses Sep 15 18:17:24 J10-51-MemCache dnsmasq[13799]: read /etc/dnsmasq.hosts - 40 addresses

tip.para: 注释no-hosts选项，可以实现 /etc/hosts 与 /etc/dnsmasq.hosts 共用

section.title: /etc/dnsmasq.d/dnsmasq.server.conf
section.para: 配置域名使用那些DNS解析
section.screen:
vim /etc/dnsmasq.d/dnsmasq.server.conf
server=/google.com/8.8.8.8 server=/yahoo.com/4.4.4.4 server=/qq.com/202.96.134.133 server=/com.cn/202.96.128.68 server=/us/208.67.222.222 server=/uk/208.67.220.220

# Add other name servers here, with domain specs if they are for # non-public domains. #server=/localnet/192.168.0.1
# Example of routing PTR queries to nameservers: this will send all # address->name queries for 192.168.3/24 to nameserver 10.1.2.3 #server=/3.168.192.in-addr.arpa/10.1.2.3

section.title: 域名劫持
section.para: 将域名解析到错误的地址，这样可以屏蔽一些网站。
例如：在企业网络中不想让员下载安装软件，可以将下载网站解析到错误的地址上去，做到网址屏蔽

section.title: FAQ
section.screen:
# hostname -i hostname: Unknown host
echo "127.0.0.1 `hostname`" >> /etc/hosts
# hostname -i 127.0.0.1
section.para: 什么时候使用 reload / restart
开启或禁用选项必须使用restart, 更新配置可以使用reload
